text: Motion
Motion
One, two, three, four...
Kiririn, it's going well!
That's a relief...

Yeah~!
Everyone's doing great!

Ah,
shall we take a short break here?
Yeah~! / Yes / Yes! / Yeah...
This is a treat from the Producer.
Oh-

there's water, tea, and... oh, regular tea too.
Plus, café lattes. Two of each.
What does everyone want?

Ah! Give me the one with lots of milk~!
And I'll take a café latte!
Okay, tea it is.
I think I'll go for black tea.

Well...
I'll just have water...
Okay!

Mitsumine will go for water too~
We've been sweating a lot...!

Yeah, it's delicious... I wonder if everyone
else is working hard at their lessons right now.
They might be.

Hehe...
I wonder what kind of live it'll turn out to be...

Having all 28 people together is amazing~!
It's definitely going to be a fun concert!
That's right.

Since we're all able to gather together, it would be
great if we could deepen our friendships even more.
It would be nice if we could have a social gathering too...
Hmm...!
I wonder about everyone's availability...
Coordinating everyone's schedules might be tough...
Everyone has work to do, after all...
That's true...

But after the concert,
there will be an after-party, right?

Indeed!
Let's ask the Producer about it!

If there's an after-party,
we can use that opportunity to bond!
Yeah, yeah, an after-party slash social gathering!
...Yeah.
It would be nice if it happens.
That's right.

Having something to look forward to might make
us work even harder during rehearsals, right?

Haha, that's true.
-- But, there's a point there.

Yeah~!
Let's give it our all until the main event!
Oh~! / Oh / Oh / Oh~! / Oh~!
